original: gnyis pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas rdzas su yod pa yin te /
analyzed: gnyis pa ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung bas rdzas su yod pa yin te /
translated: It is a substantial existence,

original: brtags par yod pa ni ma yin no //
analyzed: brtags par yod pa ni ma yin no //
translated: not an imagined existence.üîΩThe third is the perfected nature.

original: gsum pa ni rnam par dag pa'i don du dmigs pas don dam par yod pa ste /
analyzed: gsum pa ni rnam par dag pa'i don du dmigs pas don dam par yod pa ste /
translated: It is an ultimate existence,

original: rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
analyzed: rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir /
translated: because it is the object of the pure path,

original: de la dmigs pa yin gyi kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no //üîΩgzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la yang yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs nas //
analyzed: de la dmigs pa yin gyi kun nas nyon mongs par bya ba'i phyir ni ma yin no // gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid la yang yongs su grub pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs nas //
translated: and it is not the object of the afflicted path.üîΩWhen the perfected nature is apprehended in the dependent nature,üîΩit is an ultimate existence.üîΩWhen the imagined nature is apprehended in the dependent nature,

original: don dam par yod par 'gyur la kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs na ni kun rdzob tu yod par 'gyur te /
analyzed: don dam par yod par 'gyur la kun brtags pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs na ni kun rdzob tu yod par 'gyur te /
translated: it is a conventional existence.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i don du dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the object of the afflictions.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir dmigs pa ni rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin no //üîΩgzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de ni yang dag pa'i kun tu rtog par brjod de 'di la yang dag pa ma yin par kun brtags pa'am /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i phyir dmigs pa ni rnam par byang ba'i phyir ma yin no // gzhan gyi dbang gi ngo bo nyid de ni yang dag pa'i kun tu rtog par brjod de 'di la yang dag pa ma yin par kun brtags pa'am /
translated: The object of the afflictions is not the object of purification.üîΩThe other-dependent nature is called the ‚Äúimagination of what is unreal‚Äù because it is imagined to be unreal,

original: 'dis yang dag pa ma yin par kun rtog par byed pa ste /
analyzed: 'dis yang dag pa ma yin par kun rtog par byed pa ste /
translated: or because it imagines what is unreal.

original: bcom ldan 'das byams pas /
analyzed: bcom ldan 'das byams pas /
translated: As the Lord Maitreya says:

original: kun brtags gzhan gyi dbang dang ni /
analyzed: kun brtags gzhan gyi dbang dang ni /
translated: The imagined, the other-dependent,

original: yongs su grub pa nyid dag ste //üîΩdon phyir yang dag mi rtog phyir //üîΩgnyis po med pa'i phyir bshad do //
analyzed: yongs su grub pa nyid dag ste // don phyir yang dag mi rtog phyir // gnyis po med pa'i phyir bshad do //
translated: and the perfected naturesüîΩare taught because of the object,

original: zhes gang gsungs pa lta bu'o //
analyzed: zhes gang gsungs pa lta bu'o //
translated: because of the imagination of what is unreal, and because of the absence of the duality.

original: de gnyis yang khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba yin te /
analyzed: de gnyis yang khams gsum pa'i sems dang sems las byung ba yin te /
translated: These two are the mind and mental factors of the three realms.

original: de la don gyi ngo bo la dmigs pa'i sems so //
analyzed: de la don gyi ngo bo la dmigs pa'i sems so //
translated: The mind is the object of the nature of the object.

original: khyad par la dmigs pa ni sems las byung ba ste /
analyzed: khyad par la dmigs pa ni sems las byung ba ste /
translated: The mental factors are the objects of the distinctions.

original: yang dag ma yin kun rtog ni //
analyzed: yang dag ma yin kun rtog ni //
translated: The imagination of what is unreal

original: sems dang sems byung khams gsum pa //
analyzed: sems dang sems byung khams gsum pa //
translated: Mind and mental factors are of the three realms.

original: de la don mthong rnam par shes //
analyzed: de la don mthong rnam par shes //
translated: Among them, consciousness sees the object.

original: de yi khyad par sems las byung //üîΩzhes gsungs so //
analyzed: de yi khyad par sems las byung // zhes gsungs so //
translated: Its distinctions are the mental factors.

original: yang de ni rnam pa gsum ste kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩde la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi sa bon @139a * //
analyzed: yang de ni rnam pa gsum ste kun gzhi rnam par shes pa dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa'o // de la kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi sa bon @139a * //
translated: Moreover, it is threefold: the store-consciousness, the defiled mind, and the active consciousnesses.

original: gyi rten du gyur pas kun gzhi yin la rang gi ngo bo la nye bar dmigs pas rnam par shes pa'o //üîΩbdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag la chags pa dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba ste /üîΩnyon mongs pa bzhi po de dag dang rtag tu mtshungs par ldan pas nyon mongs pa yin la //
analyzed: gyi rten du gyur pas kun gzhi yin la rang gi ngo bo la nye bar dmigs pas rnam par shes pa'o // bdag tu rmongs pa dang / bdag tu lta ba dang / bdag la chags pa dang / bdag tu nga rgyal ba ste / nyon mongs pa bzhi po de dag dang rtag tu mtshungs par ldan pas nyon mongs pa yin la //
translated: Among them, the store-consciousness is the store because it is the support of the seeds of all defiled things. It is consciousness because it is the object of the self-notion.üîΩIt is defiled because it is always associated with the four defilements: self-delusion, self-view, self-conceit, and self-love.

original: bdag go zhes rtag tu rlom pa'i bdag nyid yin pas yid do //üîΩyang dang yang du 'byung bas 'jug pa yin la /
analyzed: bdag go zhes rtag tu rlom pa'i bdag nyid yin pas yid do //üîΩyang dang yang du 'byung bas 'jug pa yin la /
translated: It is mind because it is always associated with these four defilements and because it is the support of the self-notion.üîΩIt is active consciousness because it is the support of the notions of form, etc., and because it is the support of the notions of blue, etc.

original: yul la nye bar dmigs pas rnam par shes pa'o //
analyzed: yul la nye bar dmigs pas rnam par shes pa'o //
translated: Consciousness is that which is aware of objects.

original: de la dang po ni lus dang / gnas dang / longs spyod du snang ba ste /
analyzed: de la dang po ni lus dang / gnas dang / longs spyod du snang ba ste /
translated: The first of these is the appearance of the body, the place, and the objects.

original: lus ni dbang po rnams so ;
analyzed: lus ni dbang po rnams so ;
translated: The body is the sense organs.

original: ; gnas ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
analyzed: ; gnas ni snod kyi 'jig rten no //
translated: The place is the physical world.

original: longs spyod pa ni yul lnga ste /
analyzed: longs spyod pa ni yul lnga ste /
translated: The objects are the five sense objects.

original: de'i snang ba ni de'i rnam pa can no //
analyzed: de'i snang ba ni de'i rnam pa can no //
translated: The appearance of these is the form of these.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug go //
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i tshogs drug go //
translated: The consciousness that engages is the six collections of consciousness.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa ni //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa ni //
translated: Unreal imagination is

original: yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
analyzed: yang rnam pa bzhi ste /
translated: fourfold.

original: don du snang ba dang / sems can du snang ba dang / bdag tu snang ba dang / rnam par rig par snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ste bzhi pa'o //
analyzed: don du snang ba dang / sems can du snang ba dang / bdag tu snang ba dang / rnam par rig par snang ba'i rnam par shes pa ste bzhi pa'o //
translated: The four are the consciousness that appears as objects, that appears as sentient beings, that appears as a self, and that appears as representations.

original: de la longs spyod dang gnas su snang ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni don du snang ba'o //
analyzed: de la longs spyod dang gnas su snang ba'i kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni don du snang ba'o //
translated: Among these, the store consciousness that appears as objects and the place is the appearance as objects.

original: gang lus su snang ba de ni sems can du snang ba'o //
analyzed: gang lus su snang ba de ni sems can du snang ba'o //
translated: That which appears as the body is the appearance as sentient beings.

original: gang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid de ni bdag du snang ba ste /
analyzed: gang nyon mongs pa can gyi yid de ni bdag du snang ba ste /
translated: The defiled mind-consciousness is the appearance of the self,

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid la des bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid la des bdag tu 'dzin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the apprehension of self in the store consciousness.

original: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rig par snang ste /
analyzed: 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par rig par snang ste /
translated: The active forms of consciousness are the appearance of representations,

original: yul rnams 'dzin par snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: yul rnams 'dzin par snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because they appear as the apprehension of objects.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa rnam pa gnyis dang / rnam pa drug tu yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa rnam pa gnyis dang / rnam pa drug tu yang 'gyur te /
translated: Unreal imagination is twofold and sixfold.

original: ji ltar rnam pa gnyis yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa gnyis yin zhe na /
translated: How is it twofold?

original: gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
analyzed: gzung ba'i mtshan nyid dang / 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid de /
translated: It has the characteristic of the apprehended and the characteristic of the apprehender,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid du snang ba'i phyir ro //
translated: because it appears as the characteristics of the apprehended and the apprehender.

original: ji ltar rnam pa drug yin zhe na /
analyzed: ji ltar rnam pa drug yin zhe na /
translated: How is it sixfold?

original: de dag nyid so sor rnam pa gsum gsum du byas pa ste /
analyzed: de dag nyid so sor rnam pa gsum gsum du byas pa ste /
translated: Each of those two is threefold.

original: lus dang gnas dang longs spyod du snang ba dang / yid dang nye bar 'dzin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rnams so //
analyzed: lus dang gnas dang longs spyod du snang ba dang / yid dang nye bar 'dzin pa dang / rnam par rtog pa rnams so //
translated: The appearance of the body, the appearance of the place, and the appearance of enjoyment, the mind, the apprehension of objects, and the imagination of what is unreal.

original: de la yid ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
analyzed: de la yid ni nyon mongs pa can gyi yid do //
translated: The mind is the afflicted mind.

original: nye bar 'dzin pa ni 'jug par shes pa lnga rnams so //
analyzed: nye bar 'dzin pa ni 'jug par shes pa lnga rnams so //
translated: The apprehender is the five consciousnesses that engage objects.

original: rnam par rtog pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste //
analyzed: rnam par rtog pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pa ste //
translated: Conceptualization is the mental consciousness,

original: gcig tu rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid @139b yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: gcig tu rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo nyid @139b yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it has the nature of being conceptualization alone.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa ni rnam pa brgyad du yang 'gyur te /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pa ni rnam pa brgyad du yang 'gyur te /
translated: Unreal imagination is also of eight kinds:

original: kun gzhi dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ste /
analyzed: kun gzhi dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi yid dang / 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa drug ste /
translated: the store consciousness, the afflicted mind, and the six active consciousnesses.

original: brgyad do // yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa de dag ni /
analyzed: brgyad do // yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa de dag ni /
translated: These eight kinds of unreal imagination

original: zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyang yin no //üîΩyongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
analyzed: zag pa dang bcas pa'i 'du byed thams cad dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / 'khor ba thams cad kyang yin no // yongs su grub pa'i ngo bo nyid gang yin pa de ni /
translated: are all the contaminated formations, all the afflictions, and all cyclic existence.

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yin no //
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa'i stong pa nyid kyi ngo bo yin no //
translated: The perfected nature is the emptiness of unreal imagination.

original: gang gis stong zhe na /
analyzed: gang gis stong zhe na /
translated: By what is it empty?

original: gnyis kyis te /
analyzed: gnyis kyis te /
translated: By the two,

original: gzung ba dang 'dzin par kun tu rtog pas so //
analyzed: gzung ba dang 'dzin par kun tu rtog pas so //
translated: by the imagination of the apprehended and apprehender.

original: stong pa de'i mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa gang yin pa la gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i ngo bo yin par dgongs so //
analyzed: stong pa de'i mtshan nyid ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun tu rtog pa gang yin pa la gnyis su med pa dang / gnyis su byar med pa'i ngo bo yin par dgongs so //
translated: The characteristic of emptiness is the non-existence of the duality there, in that imagination of what is unreal, and the existence of that non-existence.

original: gang gi phyir stong pa nyid 'di ni //
analyzed: gang gi phyir stong pa nyid 'di ni //
translated: Because this emptiness

original: gnyis kyi dngos po med pas dngos po ma yin la //
analyzed: gnyis kyi dngos po med pas dngos po ma yin la //
translated: is not a thing, because of the non-existence of the duality,

original: gnyis po med pa'i ngo bo yin pa de'i phyir med pa yang ma yin no //
analyzed: gnyis po med pa'i ngo bo yin pa de'i phyir med pa yang ma yin no //
translated: and it is not a non-thing, because of the existence of the non-existence of the duality.

original: 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa las /üîΩde ni 'du byed rnams las gzhan nam /
analyzed: 'phags pa dgongs pa nges par 'grel pa la sogs pa las / de ni 'du byed rnams las gzhan nam /
translated: In the noble Unraveling of the Intention and so forth,

original: gzhan ma yin pa ma yin par gsungs te /
analyzed: gzhan ma yin pa ma yin par gsungs te /
translated: it is said that it is neither different nor non-different from the formative forces.

original: 'di ltar gal te de dag las gzhan ma yin par gyur na /
analyzed: 'di ltar gal te de dag las gzhan ma yin par gyur na /
translated: Thus, if it were not different from them,

original: byis pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnams mthong bas na /
analyzed: byis pa rnams kyi 'du byed rnams mthong bas na /
translated: then when fools see the formative forces,

original: stong pa nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang mthong bar 'gyur la /
translated: they would also see emptiness.

original: des na bden pa mthong bas dgra bcom pa nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yi bar du 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na bden pa mthong bas dgra bcom pa nas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yi bar du 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, one becomes an arhat who has seen the truth, and one becomes a perfect buddha.

original: gzhan yang 'du byed rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa yin pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzhan yang 'du byed rnams kun nas nyon mongs pa yin pa de bzhin du /
translated: Moreover, if formations are thoroughly afflicted,

original: stong pa nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur la /
analyzed: stong pa nyid kyang kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur la /
translated: emptiness would also be thoroughly afflicted.

original: stong pa nyid rtag pa bzhin du 'du byed rnams kyang rtag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid rnams la bye brag med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: stong pa nyid rtag pa bzhin du 'du byed rnams kyang rtag par 'gyur ba dang / ji ltar stong pa nyid rnams la bye brag med pa de bzhin du /
translated: And just as emptiness is permanent, formations would also be permanent, and just as there is no difference in emptiness,

original: de rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: de rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid kyang bye brag med par 'gyur ro //
translated: their individual characteristics would also be without difference.

original: gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid las mchog tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid btsal du med pa de bzhin du /
analyzed: gzhan yang rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis stong pa nyid las mchog tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid btsal du med pa de bzhin du /
translated: Moreover, just as yogins do not seek a reality that is superior to emptiness,

original: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid las mchog tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid btsal du med par 'gyur bas /
analyzed: 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid las mchog tu gyur pa'i de kho na nyid btsal du med par 'gyur bas /
translated: they would not seek a reality that is superior to the characteristics of formations.

original: de'i phyir de ni de rnams las gzhan ma yin pa ma yin no //
analyzed: de'i phyir de ni de rnams las gzhan ma yin pa ma yin no //
translated: Therefore, it is not the case that emptiness is not different from them.

original: gzhan pa yang ma yin te gang las she na /
analyzed: gzhan pa yang ma yin te gang las she na /
translated: Nor is it anything other than that.

original: gang gi @140a * //
analyzed: gang gi @140a * //
translated: From what?

original: phyir de ni de rnams kyi bdag med pa tsam ste /
analyzed: phyir de ni de rnams kyi bdag med pa tsam ste /
translated: Because that is the mere selflessness of those,

original: dung gi dkar ba bzhin du /
analyzed: dung gi dkar ba bzhin du /
translated: like the whiteness of a conch,

original: rang bzhin med pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: rang bzhin med pa tsam yin pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because it is the mere absence of intrinsic reality.

original: gzhan yang de rnams las gzhan par 'gyur na /
analyzed: gzhan yang de rnams las gzhan par 'gyur na /
translated: Moreover, if it were other than those,

original: bden pa mthong ba rnams kyis kyang 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan ma zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la /
analyzed: bden pa mthong ba rnams kyis kyang 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan ma zil gyis gnon par mi 'gyur la /
translated: those who see the truth would not overcome the signs of the compounded.

original: des na mtshan ma'i 'ching ba dang / gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las 'grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na mtshan ma'i 'ching ba dang / gnas ngan len gyi 'ching ba las 'grol bar mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, they would not be liberated from the bondage of signs and the bondage of negative propensities.

original: des na mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar 'di dag tu yang mi 'gyur ro //
analyzed: des na mya ngan las 'das pa dang / yang dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bar 'di dag tu yang mi 'gyur ro //
translated: Therefore, there would be no nirvana, up to no perfect buddha.

original: gzhan yang 'di ni 'du byed rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid du yang mi 'gyur la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid dag kyang cig car tha dad par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: gzhan yang 'di ni 'du byed rnams kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid du yang mi 'gyur la kun nas nyon mongs pa dang rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid dag kyang cig car tha dad par 'gyur ro //
translated: Moreover, this would not be the general characteristic of the compounded, and the characteristics of affliction and purification would simultaneously be different.

original: de bas na 'di ni de dag las gzhan ma yin te /
analyzed: de bas na 'di ni de dag las gzhan ma yin te /
translated: Therefore, this is not different from those.üîΩAnd also:

original: gang yang / gnyis dngos med pa'i dngos po yi //
analyzed: gang yang / gnyis dngos med pa'i dngos po yi //
translated: The entity of the non-existence of the two

original: dngos po stong pa'i mtshan nyid de //
analyzed: dngos po stong pa'i mtshan nyid de //
translated: is the characteristic of the emptiness of entity.

original: dngos po ma yin dngos med min//
analyzed: dngos po ma yin dngos med min//
translated: It is not an entity, nor is it a non-entity.

original: tha dad gcig gi mtshan nyid min //
analyzed: tha dad gcig gi mtshan nyid min //
translated: It is not the characteristic of difference or identity.

original: zhes gsungs so //
analyzed: zhes gsungs so //
translated: Thus it is said.

original: de lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du /üîΩming gi rnam grangs ni /
analyzed: de lta bu'i stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid ji lta ba bzhin du / ming gi rnam grangs ni /
translated: The synonyms of emptiness, which has such a characteristic,

original: de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / don dam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid ces bya ba dag yin no //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / don dam pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid ces bya ba dag yin no //
translated: are thusness, the perfect culmination, signlessness, the ultimate, the dharma-constituent, and the dharma-inherence.

original: des na rnam grangs kyi don ni 'gyur ba med pas na de bzhin nyid de dus thams cad du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: des na rnam grangs kyi don ni 'gyur ba med pas na de bzhin nyid de dus thams cad du gnas pa'i phyir ro //
translated: The meaning of the synonyms is as follows: It is thusness because it is unchanging, since it abides in all times.

original: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid yin la /
analyzed: yang dag pa ni de kho na nyid yin la /
translated: The perfect is reality.

original: de'i mtha' ni mchog tu gyur pa ste /
analyzed: de'i mtha' ni mchog tu gyur pa ste /
translated: The culmination of that is the supreme.

original: des na yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
analyzed: des na yang dag pa'i mtha'o //
translated: Therefore, it is the perfect culmination.

original: 'di la mtshan ma rnams med pas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
analyzed: 'di la mtshan ma rnams med pas na mtshan ma med pa ste /
translated: It is signless because it is devoid of signs.

original: spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad nub pas de la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: spros pa'i mtshan ma thams cad nub pas de la dmigs pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Since all signs of conceptual thought have disappeared, it is the object of that.

original: dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes yin la /
analyzed: dam pa ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes yin la /
translated: The highest is supramundane intuition.

original: don ni de'i yul yin te /
analyzed: don ni de'i yul yin te /

original: des na don dam pa'o //
analyzed: des na don dam pa'o //

analyzed: chos ni 'phags pa'i chos rnams so //

original: de rnams kyi rgyu yin pas na dbyings te /
analyzed: de rnams kyi rgyu yin pas na dbyings te /

analyzed: dngos po rnams kyi chos kyi rang bzhin yin pas na chos nyid do //

original: de la de'i dbye ba brjod de //
analyzed: de la de'i dbye ba brjod de //

analyzed: sngon gyi gnas skabs su ni kun nas nyon mongs pa 'di'i bdag nyid la yin pa'i glo bur gyi dri ma can yang yin la /

analyzed: phyis ni 'phags pa'i lam gyis @140b de rnams spangs pas rnam par dag par 'gyur zhing dri ma med pa yin te /

analyzed: gal te nyon mongs de ma gyur //

original: gal te rnam dag de ma gyur //
analyzed: gal te rnam dag de ma gyur //

analyzed: 'bad pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur //

original: de ni dag dang ma dag min //
analyzed: de ni dag dang ma dag min //

analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin 'od gsal ba //

original: rnam par shes pa brgyad bstan pa de dag las /
analyzed: rnam par shes pa brgyad bstan pa de dag las /
translated: From among those eight consciousnesses that have been taught,

analyzed: re zhig kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni dge ba'i las kyis bde 'gror smin la mi dge bas ni ngan 'gror smin te /

analyzed: bskyed nas kyang chu bo'i rgyun bzhin du ji srid 'tsho'i bar du 'jug par 'gyur la /

analyzed: chu rgyun bzhin 'bab sa bon thams cad pa //

original: bdag tu rtog par gyur na mi rung zhes //

translated: I have not taught it to them.

analyzed: de ni dgra bcom pa nyid la ldog par 'gyur ro //

original: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid las skyes nas 'jug par 'gyur te /üîΩ'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mngon du byas pa dang / 'gog pa'i @141a * //
analyzed: nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid las skyes nas 'jug par 'gyur te / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i lam mngon du byas pa dang / 'gog pa'i @141a * //
translated: The afflicted mind arises from that very fundamental consciousness and then engages.

original: snyoms par 'jug pa na ldog par 'gyur la /
analyzed: snyoms par 'jug pa na ldog par 'gyur la /

analyzed: de dag las langs nas kyang kun gzhi nyid las 'jug par 'gyur te /

original: yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang skad cig re re zhing kun gzhi las byung nas 'jug par 'gyur la sems med pa'i gnyid dang / brgyal ba dang / 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / 'du shes med pa dang / 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag las mi skye'o //üîΩrnam par shes pa lhag ma lnga ni chu las rlabs dang 'dra bar kun gzhi nyid las rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du cig car ram /

translated: The mental consciousness also arises from the store consciousness and engages objects in each moment. It does not arise from the unconscious states of sleep, faint, the meditative absorption of non-perception, or the meditative absorption of cessation.

original: rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
analyzed: rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur te /
translated: The remaining five consciousnesses are like waves in water. They arise from the store consciousness in a series or simultaneously, according to conditions.

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid sa bon thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de nyid sa bon thams cad kyi rten yin pa'i phyir ro //

original: de ltar 'khor ba ji srid pa'i bar du'o //
analyzed: de ltar 'khor ba ji srid pa'i bar du'o //
translated: This is the way it is as long as there is sa·πÉsƒÅra.

analyzed: ji ltar na mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur zhe na /
translated: How does nirvƒÅ·πáa come about?

analyzed: 'dir rnal 'byor pa rnams bsgoms pa'i stobs kyis 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur ro //

analyzed: de yang nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams ni chos thams cad la bdag dang bdag gi rang bzhin gyis stong pas dmigs la /
translated: Furthermore, the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas focus on the emptiness of all phenomena of the nature of self and being mine.

analyzed: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong pas kyang dmigs so //
translated: The bodhisattvas focus on the emptiness of the nature of apprehendeds and apprehenders.

analyzed: de ltar bsgoms pas dang po skyes pa'i ye shes de ni don dam pa'i bden pa ma mthong ba las mthong ba'i lam zhes brjod do //
translated: Through meditating in that way, that pristine wisdom that first arises is called the path of seeing because it sees what was not seen, the ultimate truth.

analyzed: de'i 'og tu de nyid yang dang yang mngon du byed pa rnams ni bsgom pa'i lam zhes bya ste /

translated: Listeners and solitary realizers become arhats and bodhisattvas eliminate the habitual tendencies to the defilement related and cognitive obscurations on the ten levels, as is appropriate to each level.

original: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /
analyzed: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te /

original: dgra bcom pa 'di gsum la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ldog par 'gyur ro //
analyzed: dgra bcom pa 'di gsum la kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ldog par 'gyur ro //

original: log pa ji lta bu @141b zhig ce na /
analyzed: log pa ji lta bu @141b zhig ce na /
translated: What does it mean to eliminate it?

original: gnas gyur pa ste sems kyi rgyun gyi mtshan nyid kun nas nyon mongs pa'i gnas su gyur pa'i cha log nas rnam par byang ba'i cha nam mkha' ji srid pa'i bar du 'jug pa ste /

translated: It means that the aspect of the mind stream that is characterized by defilement is eliminated and the aspect of complete purification continues until the end of space.

original: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas /
analyzed: kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad kyi sa bon du gyur pa'i bag chags yang dag par bcad pas /
translated: By completely eliminating the habitual propensities that are the seeds of all afflicted phenomena,

original: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de'i dngos po de'i gnas su gyur pa spangs pa ni sa bon zad pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa de'i dngos po de'i gnas su gyur pa spangs pa ni sa bon zad pas kun nas nyon mongs pa'i chos thams cad skye bar mi 'gyur te /

analyzed: de'i tshe rten de ni nam mkha' ltar ro gcig pa nyid kyis zag pa med pa'i dbyings zhes brjod la /
translated: At that time, that basis is said to be the uncontaminated realm, since it is of one taste like space.

original: sa bon zad pas lus dang / gnas dang longs spyod du snang ba'i rnam par shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur te /
analyzed: sa bon zad pas lus dang / gnas dang longs spyod du snang ba'i rnam par shes pa skye bar mi 'gyur te /
translated: Since the seeds are exhausted, the consciousness that appears as the body, the abode, and enjoyments will not arise.

original: rnam par grol ba'i sku zhes bya bar yang brjod do //
analyzed: rnam par grol ba'i sku zhes bya bar yang brjod do //
translated: It is also called the ‚Äúliberated body.‚Äù

original: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag las bye brag med de /
analyzed: de nyid kyis na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas dag las bye brag med de /
translated: Thus, the liberated body of the bhagavat buddhas is not different from that of the ≈õrƒÅvakas and pratyekabuddhas.

analyzed: thams cad kyi rnam par grol ba'i sku shel dag pa lta bu khyad par med pa'i phyir ro //
translated: because the liberated body of all of them is like a pure crystal, and is not distinguished.

original: chos kyi sku ni de dag las khyad par 'phags te /
analyzed: chos kyi sku ni de dag las khyad par 'phags te /
translated: The Dharma Body is superior to them.

original: 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams ni rnam par grol ba'i sku thams cad du gnas gyur pa dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa zad pa'i phyir ro //üîΩyang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzhir gyur pas chos kyi sku yang yin te /
analyzed: 'di ltar sangs rgyas rnams ni rnam par grol ba'i sku thams cad du gnas gyur pa dag ni kun nas nyon mongs pa zad pa'i phyir ro // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi gzhir gyur pas chos kyi sku yang yin te /
translated: Thus, the Buddhas, having become the basis of the liberated body of all, are the Dharma Body, because of the exhaustion of all defilement.üîΩIt is the Dharma Body because it is the basis of the qualities of a perfect Buddha.

original: chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rten byed pas so //
analyzed: chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi rten byed pas so //
translated: The Dharma Body is the basis of the qualities of a Buddha because it is the support of the qualities of a Buddha.

original: ci'i phyir de rnams kyi rten yin zhe na /
analyzed: ci'i phyir de rnams kyi rten yin zhe na /
translated: Why is it the support of those qualities?

original: dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: dpag tu med pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs dang / smon lam gyi stobs bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because of the power of the generation of the immeasurable collections of merit and knowledge and of the vow.

original: chos kyi skus khyad par du gyur pas na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i skus bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pas /
analyzed: chos kyi skus khyad par du gyur pas na longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang / sprul pa'i skus bsdus pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos dpag tu med pas /
translated: The Dharma Body is the basis of the immeasurable qualities of a Buddha, which are included in the Enjoyment Body and the Transformation Body.

original: de dag las khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di lta ste /
analyzed: de dag las khyad par du 'phags pa ni 'di lta ste /
translated: The most excellent of these are as follows:

original: 'od zer gyis khyad ches 'phags pa yin te /
analyzed: 'od zer gyis khyad ches 'phags pa yin te /
translated: However, they are superior due to the excellence of their light rays.

original: bdag nyid chen po'i sems can de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can rnams kyi las bdag por gyur pa'i phyir ro //üîΩci ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das @142a * //
analyzed: bdag nyid chen po'i sems can de dag gi byin gyi rlabs dang / sems can rnams kyi las bdag por gyur pa'i phyir ro // ci ste sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'jig rten las 'das @142a * //
translated: This is because of the power of those great beings and the karma of sentient beings.

original: pa'i ye shes la chos thams cad ji ltar snang zhe na /
analyzed: pa'i ye shes la chos thams cad ji ltar snang zhe na /
translated: If the supramundane wisdom of the buddhas and bodhisattvas is like this, how do all phenomena appear in it?

original: nam mkha' dri ma med pa 'ba' zhig mtha' med pa dang 'dra bar /
analyzed: nam mkha' dri ma med pa 'ba' zhig mtha' med pa dang 'dra bar /
translated: Like the mere stainless sky,

original: de bzhin nyid kyi ro gcig tu snang ngo //
analyzed: de bzhin nyid kyi ro gcig tu snang ngo //
translated: they appear as having the same taste in suchness.

original: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
analyzed: de ci'i phyir zhe na /
translated: Why is this?

original: chos thams cad dang / chos kyi mtshan ma rnams der nub pa'i phyir ro //
analyzed: chos thams cad dang / chos kyi mtshan ma rnams der nub pa'i phyir ro //
translated: Because all phenomena and the signs of phenomena disappear there.

original: de ltar na chos rnams sna tshogs pa yin bzhin du /
analyzed: de ltar na chos rnams sna tshogs pa yin bzhin du /
translated: Thus, while phenomena are various,

analyzed: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i ye shes rnam pa gcig tu snang bas /
translated: Because supramundane wisdom appears as a single aspect,

original: 'khrul pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
analyzed: 'khrul pa nyid kyis yang dag pa'i ye shes ma yin par 'gyur ro zhe na /
translated: delusion itself would not be authentic wisdom.

original: de'i phyir 'di thams cad brdzun pa nyid yin te /
analyzed: de'i phyir 'di thams cad brdzun pa nyid yin te /
translated: Therefore, all of this is false,

original: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pas /
analyzed: yang dag pa ma yin pa'i kun du rtog pas /
translated: because it is a misconception,

original: ming dang mtshan mar btags par zad do //
analyzed: ming dang mtshan mar btags par zad do //
translated: and it is merely designated with names and signs.

original: phyin ci ma log pa la dgod pa las gsungs pa /
analyzed: phyin ci ma log pa la dgod pa las gsungs pa /
translated: The Unerring Introduction says:

original: byams pa de ltar na ni 'di dag rnam par rtog pa tsam ste /
analyzed: byams pa de ltar na ni 'di dag rnam par rtog pa tsam ste /
translated: Maitreya, thus these are mere conceptualizations.

original: 'di lta ste /
analyzed: 'di lta ste /

original: 'du byed rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan ma gang du /
analyzed: 'du byed rnams kyi dngos po'i mtshan ma gang du /
translated: The sign of the entity of formations,

original: gang 'di gzugs zhes bya ba nas /

analyzed: 'di la don dam pa yod pas zhes bya ba'i phyir ro //
